description:
Add search terms as nodes. You can search for hashtags (starting with #) and users (starting with @).

This preset gives you back the 50 most recent tweets matching the query. In case you want to fetch more, change the count-parameter or increase the maximum pages.

If you want to change the parameters, take a look at https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/search/api-reference/get-search-tweets.html to see which ones are possible.

Please remind that Twitter distinguishes between standard (for free), premium and enterprise (both paid) search. If you're looking for older tweets from years ago this will not work with the standard search.
name: Get tweets by hashtag
